official_title: The Effects of Prosocial Writing on Psychological Well-being: An Online Randomized Controlled Trial Among Young Adult Cancer Survivors
inclusion_criteria:
* diagnosis of cancer (any type) between the ages of 15 and 39 years
* have completed primary treatment and are in remission (partial or complete)
* between the ages of 18 and 39 years
* fluent in English
* have access to the internet and email.
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
Must have maximum age of 39 Years
